title: Can hackers create a camera on a phone screen? - Quora

response.answer_text: No its not possible to create a hardware device by hacking to record you. If you have front camera they can use it to capture or record by hack. Another option they just start capturing your screen and turn on you back cam in background recording mode but no one can make or convert your mobile screen to camera by software hacking

Of course they can But the premise is that they must use Trojan horses to control your computer So it is recommended that you do a good job of mobile phone security protection to avoid personal privacy being stolen
